scripts.server: bun run protocol:build && bun run server:only
scripts.client: bun run protocol:build && bun run client:only
scripts.web: bun run protocol:build && bun run web:only
scripts.ios: bun run protocol:build && bun run ios:only
scripts.android: bun run protocol:build && bun run android:only
scripts.localbuddy: bun run protocol:build && bun run localbuddy:only
scripts.workerpals: bun run protocol:build && bun run workerpals:only
scripts.source_control_manager: bun run protocol:build && bun run source_control_manager:only
scripts.remotebuddy: bun run protocol:build && bun run remotebuddy:only
scripts.dev: bun run protocol:build && concurrently -p "[{time}][{name}]" -t "HH:mm:ss" -n server,client -c blue,green "bun run server:only" "bun run client:only"
scripts.dev:full: bun run protocol:build && concurrently -p "[{time}][{name}]" -t "HH:mm:ss" -n server,localbuddy,remotebuddy,workerpals,source_control_manager,client -c blue,magenta,red,yellow,cyan,green "bun run server:only" "bun run localbuddy:only" "bun run remotebuddy:only" "bun run workerpals:only:docker" "bun run source_control_manager:only:dev" "bun run client:only:offline"
scripts.test: bun run test:root && bun run test:protocol
